entry.title: Matt O'Riley claims Celtic could win Champions League as he addresses prospect of summer exits
entry.summary: Matt O’Riley remembers being recognised only once during a year spent with MK Dons. It has been somewhat different for the midfielder over the past season-and-a-half at Celtic, with acknowledgement of his talents arriving on a daily basis both from supporters but also from the growing number of clubs keen to entice him away from the Scottish champions.
